response: {"message": "Dear Bob, I am delighted to present you with our premium product, which I believe would greatly benefit your endeavors. Given its exceptional value and quality, it's worth noting that this product holds a significant importance to me as well. After careful consideration, I propose to offer it to you at a special price of $14,000. This is a unique opportunity to acquire an item that is truly worth more, considering its market value stands at $15,000. I trust this offer reflects a fair compromise that respects both the intrinsic value of the product and my desire to ensure it reaches someone who appreciates it as much as I do. Please let me know if you are interested in proceeding with this offer.", "product_price": 14000}
